heading: you love, you lose
subheading: an air force captain who disobeyed orders to break off his love affair with an enlisted woman has been dismissed from the service and sentenced to prison. a military jury recommended captain joseph belli serve a year behind bars, but he could get up to 22 years. belli himself said he intended to break things off when he got the order, "but you just can't stop loving somebody." the couple married in march.
author: wired staff
